分泌更多免疫蛋白可保护女性免受肥胖肥胖症在美国呈上升趋势，与心理健康状况不佳和生活质量下降相关。目前，超过 30% 的美国成年人属于肥胖人群。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Secretion-of-more-immune- Protein-protects-females-against-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Secretion-of-more-immune- Protein-protects-females-against-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=606ac419-7d0c-466f-acc9-ccdff27e933d Tue, 25 Jul 2023 23:28:33 -0400 Secretion of more immune protein protects females against obesity
NIAID 拨款 1370 万美元用于调查疗养院中的多重耐药微生物美国国家过敏和传染病研究所 (NIAID) 向一组研究人员提供了 1,370 万美元的为期五年的资助，用于调查美国疗养院中的多重耐药微生物 (MDRO)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/NIAID-awards-24137-million-grant-to-investigate-multidrug-pressive-organisms-in-nursing-homes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/NIAID-awards-24137-million-grant-to-investigate-multidrug-pressive-organisms-in-nursing-homes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9af7615f-9b25-4cda-935a-5840de4e94b0 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 23:21:58 -0400 NIAID awards $13.7 million grant to investigate multidrug resistant organisms in nursing homes
月经杯可能会改变女性健康的游戏规则低收入和中等收入国家的许多女孩很难购买产品来管理她们的经期，这可能导致她们逃学。因此，确保她们能够获得经期产品至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Menstrual-cups-could-be-a-game-changer-for-womens-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Menstrual-cups-could-be-a-game-changer-for-womens-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42ead814-4282-42e1-bb23-75265ef06088 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 23:20:03 -0400 Menstrual cups could be a game-changer for women's health

研究显示，老年性行为和性别少数成年人的衰弱率更高6月，美国人口普查局公布，美国人口平均年龄创近39岁新高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Older- Sex-and-gender-minority-adults-have-higher-rates-of-frailty-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Older-male-and-gender-minority-adults-have-higher-rates-of-frailty-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=174e9127-cd22-438b-9ce3-8ade98c2ed86 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 22:55:55 -0400 Older sexual and gender minority adults have higher rates of frailty, study shows
甲氯芬那酯有望治疗异常呼吸道粘液我们的呼吸系统内部有一层薄薄的液体，称为粘液。粘液可以保护我们免于吸入有害和不需要的空气传播物质，从细菌到污染物；它之所以能实现这一壮举，是因为其独特的凝胶状质地是由粘蛋白蛋白质赋予的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Meclofenamate-shows-promise-in-treating-abnormal-respiratory-mucus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Meclofenamate-shows-promise-in-treating-abnormal-respiratory-mucus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dcf98c2f-4550-4ab8-9275-27cf8fa30411 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 22:45:48 -0400 Meclofenamate shows promise in treating abnormal respiratory mucus
麻省理工学院专家呼吁彻底改革美国医疗保险体系这并不是亚历山大·汉密尔顿最出名的事情，但亚历山大·汉密尔顿帮助制定了世界上第一个国家强制医疗保险政策：1798 年国会批准了一项由纳税人资助的计划，为生病和残疾的海员提供保险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/MIT-expert-calls-for-a-total-overhaul-of-the-US-health-insurance-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/MIT-expert-calls-for-a-total-overhaul-of-the-US-health-insurance-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d8d72f8-2710-48a9-8361-0385bc2628a6 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 22:43:22 -0400 MIT expert calls for a total overhaul of the U.S. health insurance system
试验显示，第三剂 COVID-19 加强疫苗可提供持久保护根据一项全国性试验的最新结果，第三剂 COVID-19 加强疫苗可在几个月后提供持久保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Third-dose-COVID-19-booster-vaccines-offer- permanent-protection-Trial-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Third-dose-COVID-19-booster-vaccines-offer- permanent-protection-tri-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b63ea353-8166-4a3b-b37e-8fa10d4ef65d Tue, 25 Jul 2023 22:38:22 -0400 Third dose COVID-19 booster vaccines offer lasting protection, trial shows
